definitions: a structure built on top of something else.
shortDefinitions: structure built on top of something else

definitions: the parts of a ship, other than masts and rigging, built above its hull and main deck.
shortDefinitions: parts of ship, other than masts and rigging, built above its hull and main deck

definitions: the part of a building above its foundations.
shortDefinitions: part of building above its foundations

definitions: a concept or idea based on others

examples.text: a distinction between foundations and superstructure, basic and non-basic beliefs, is central

shortDefinitions: concept or idea based on others

definitions: (in Marxist theory) the institutions and culture considered to result from or reflect the economic system underlying a society.
shortDefinitions: (in Marxist theory) institutions and culture considered to result from or reflect economic system underlying society
